entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain or snow at times mixed with rain beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow at times mixed with rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
